    • makeReservation

      public void makeReservation(ArrayList<Guest> guestDetails, Room roomDetails, String billingInformation, Calendar checkInDate, Calendar checkOutDate, int adultCount, int childrenCount, int numberOfNights)
      Parameters:
      guestDetails - array list of guest
      roomDetails - room object
      billingInformation - credit card name of guest
      checkInDate - calendar type object to get check-in date
      checkOutDate - calendar type object to get check-out date
      adultCount - number of adults
      childrenCount - number of children
      numberOfNights - number of nights to be staying

      searches for a specific reservation
      Parameters:
      resId - unique identifier for reservations
      Returns:
